sourcesContent:
import React, { useRef } from 'react' import { IoIosArrowRoundForward, IoIosArrowForward } from 'react-icons/io' import PerfectScrollbar from 'react-perfect-scrollbar' import './Funnel.css' import $ from 'jquery' import { rectangle } from 'leaflet' import { Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardBody, Row, Col } from 'reactstrap' import Table from './Table' const Funnel = ({ res, table }) => { const textInput = useRef([]) function handleClick(e) { console.log(e.ref) // console.log({textInput}) // console.log(textInput.current) // textInput.current.focus(); } // $(document).ready(function (e) { // $('.hide1').show() // $('.hide2, .hide3, .hide4').hide() // $('.rectangle01').click(function () { // $('.hide2, .hide3, .hide4').hide() // $('.hide1').show() // }) // $('.rectangle03').click(function () { // $('.hide1, .hide3, .hide4').hide() // $('.hide2').show() // }) // $('.rectangle05').click(function () { // $('.hide1, .hide2, .hide4').hide() // $('.hide3').show() // }) // $('.rectangle07').click(function () { // $('.hide1, .hide2, .hide3').hide() // $('.hide4').show() // }) // }) $(document).ready(function () { const hide1 = $('.hide1') const hide2 = $('.hide2') const hide3 = $('.hide3') const hide4 = $('.hide4') const rect01 = $('.rectangle01') const rect03 = $('.rectangle03') const rect05 = $('.rectangle05') const rect07 = $('.rectangle07') hide1.show() hide2.add(hide3).add(hide4).hide() rect01.click(function (e) { hide2.add(hide3).add(hide4).hide() hide1.show() }) rect03.click(function (e) { hide1.add(hide3).add(hide4).hide() hide2.show() }) rect05.click(function (e) { hide1.add(hide2).add(hide4).hide() hide3.show() }) rect07.click(function (e) { hide1.add(hide2).add(hide3).hide() hide4.show() }) }) return ( <> {res ?

TOFU

MOFU

BOFU

Conversion

Top-of-Funnel

Reach –

{res?.Tofu?.Reach?.toLocaleString()}

Unique Reach –

{res?.Tofu?.Unique_Reach?.toLocaleString()}

Spends ($) –

{res?.Tofu?.Spends?.toFixed(2)}

Session –

{res?.Tofu?.Session?.toLocaleString()}

CTR % –

{res?.Tofu?.CTR.toFixed(2)}

Demographics –

{res?.Tofu?.Demographics && res?.Tofu?.Demographics.map((val) => { return ( <>
  • {val.Gender} : {val.Sessions?.toLocaleString()}
    • ) })}

    Middle-of-Funnel

    Product Preference –

    {res?.Mofu?.product_Preference && res?.Mofu?.product_Preference.map((val) => { return ( <>
  • {val.product_name} : {val.visitors_count.toLocaleString()}
    • ) })}

    Product Engagement –

    {res?.Mofu?.product_Engagement && res?.Mofu?.product_Engagement.map((val) => { return ( <>
  • {val.product_name} : {val.Engagement.toFixed(1)}
    • ) })}

    OS Preference –

    {res?.Mofu?.os_Preference && res?.Mofu?.os_Preference.map((val) => { return ( <>
  • {val.OS} : {val.percentage} %
    • ) })}

    Avg. Pages per session –

    {res?.Mofu?.avg_pages_per_session?.toLocaleString()}

    Avg. Time Per Session (in secs) –

    {res?.Mofu?.avg_time_per_session?.toLocaleString()}

    Bottom-of-Funnel

    Add To Cart –

    {res?.Bofu?.add_to_cart?.toLocaleString()}

    Initiate Checkout –

    {res?.Bofu?.initiate_checkout?.toLocaleString()}

    Checkout Value ($) –

    {res?.Bofu?.checkout_value?.toFixed(2)}

    Cost per Lead ($) –

    {res?.Bofu?.cost_per_lead?.toFixed(2)}

    Visitor to Cart Conversion Rate % –

    {res?.Bofu?.visitor_to_cart_conversion_rate.toFixed(1)}

    Abandoned Cart –

    {res?.Bofu?.abandoned_cart}

    Abandoned Cart Value ($) –

    {res?.Bofu?.abandoned_cart_value.toFixed(2)}

    Returning Users Cart Value ($) –

    {res?.Bofu?.returning_users_cart_value.toFixed(2)}

    New Users Cart Value ($) –

    {res?.Bofu?.new_users_cart_value.toFixed(2)}

    Conversion-Funnel

    Conversions –

    {res?.Conversion?.conversions}

    Revenue ($) –

    {res?.Conversion?.revenue.toFixed(2)}

    Cost Per Conversion ($) –

    {res?.Conversion?.cost_per_conversion.toFixed(2)}

    ROAS –

    {res?.Conversion?.roas.toFixed(1)}

    Avg. Order Value ($) –

    {res?.Conversion?.avg_order_value?.toFixed(2)}
    : ndivl}
    {/* */} ) } export default Funnel
